content: नंदिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नंद्-णिनि] {@--1@} Happy, pleased, glad, delighted. {@--2@} Making happy, gladdening, giving delight; <ls>U. 3. 14.</ls> {@--3@} Delighting in, liking. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A son. {@--2@} The speaker of a prelude or benediction in a drama. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of the door-keeper of Śiva, his chief attendant, or of the bull which he rides; लतागृहद्वारगतोऽथ नंदी <ls>Ku. 3. 41</ls>; <ls>Māl. 1. 1.</ls> {@--4@} An epithet of Viṣṇu. {@--5@} The Indian figtree. --नी {@--1@} A daughter; <ls>U. 1. 9.</ls> {@--2@} A husband's sister {@--3@} A fabulous cow, daughter of {%Surabhi%}, yielding all desires (कामधेनु) and in the possession of the sage Vasiṣṭha; अनिंद्या नंदिनी नाम धेनुराववृते वनात् <ls>R. 1. 82</ls>, <ls n="R.">2. 69.</ls> {@--4@} An epithet of the Ganges. {@--5@} The holy basil.
